topic.title: AppendixAmendment to the Basis for Conclusions on IAS 19 Employee Benefits

p.i: This Appendix contains an amendment to the Basis for Conclusions on IAS 19 that is necessary in order to ensure consistency with IAS 24.
The amendment contained in this appendix when IAS 24 (as revised) was issued in 2009 has been incorporated into the Basis for Conclusions on IAS 19 published in this volume.
